configuration.title: Survey-Building Experience
configuration.name: How was your experience?
configuration.close_confirm_message: You will lose your progress if you close this survey.
configuration.description: Please tell us about your experience with our survey builder.
configuration.disclaimer_text: Note: Our company policy for submissions does not allow us to accept ideas or materials we have not specifically requested.
configuration.success_message: Thank you for your valuable time. Your feedback will be used to help us improve our features for you!
configuration.validation_error: Error: Please fix your response to continue

questions.value: Do you love our current survey building and management experience?
questions.error_message: Error - There was a problem with your single-select answer.

questions.value: Nested question is showing up?
questions.error_message: Error - There was a problem with your single-select answer.

questions.value: Happy to hear! What do you love most about our survey experience?
questions.error_message: Error - There was a problem with your multi-select answer.

answer_choices.value: Easy to launch and target a survey
Management of active and inactive surveys

questions.value: We're sorry to hear that! What would you like to see us improve about our survey experience?
questions.error_message: Error - There was a problem with your multi-select answer.

answer_choices.value: Management of active and inactive surveys

questions.value: Which two survey features are the most important to you?
questions.error_message: Error - There was a problem with your multi-select answer.

answer_choices.value: Quickly build and launch a survey
Ability to follow up with my customer based on specific responses
Guidance on survey best practices and effective question sets

questions.value: We are testing our new Survey Logic capabilities in this survey! Did you love this new survey experience? (No ends the survey)
questions.error_message: Error - There was a problem with your single-select answer.

questions.value: What did you love most about this new survey experience with logic?
questions.error_message: Error - There was a problem with your text answer.

questions.value: What would you improve in this new survey experience with logic?
questions.error_message: Error - There was a problem with your text answer.

questions.value: Can we contact you for additional feedback or testing to help us improve our Survey Logic features?
questions.error_message: Error - There was a problem with your single-select answer.

answer_choices.value: Yes, I would be happy to share feedback

composer.title: New Message
composer.close_confirm_body: Are you sure you want to discard this message?

greeting.title: Hello!
greeting.body: We'd love to get feedback from you on our app. The more details you can provide, the better.

status.body: We will get back to you soon!

automated_message.body: Please let us know how to make Apptentive better for you!

error_messages.http_error_body: It looks like we're having trouble sending your message. We've saved it and will try sending it again soon.
error_messages.network_error_body: It looks like you aren't connected to the Internet right now. We've saved your message and will try again when we detect a connection.
